mapper.select: select b.title,b.content,p.pt_img_file from board b join PT_group p on b.board_num=p.board_num join apply_user a on p.board_num=a.board_num where a.user_id=#{param1} and a.user_state='참여중';
mapper.update: update user set user_nickname=#{user_nickname}, tel=#{tel}, height=#{height}, gender=#{gender}, age=#{age}, profie_img=#{profie_img} where user_id=#{user_id};
